EmailTemplate.description: Fee Past Due Payment Notice to be sent on 46th day of fee creation
EmailTemplate.name: Fee Past Due Payment Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Order for Case # {!MUSW__Fee__c.MUSW__License2__c} â€“ Fine payment past due
EmailTemplate.textOnly: PAST DUE PAYMENT {!MUSW__License2__c.Licensee_Name__c} [Business name] (if applicable) [Address] [City], [State] [Zip] On {!Today} the Director of the Department of Licensing issued a Final Order for the case number shown above that assessed you a civil fine of {!MUSW__Fee__c.MUSW__Amount__c}. Our records show your current outstanding fine balance is {!MUSW__Fee__c.MUSW__Outstanding_Fee__c}. If you think our records are in error, provide a copy of your canceled check or other proof of payment. We must receive either payment or proof of payment of {!MUSW__Fee__c.MUSW__Outstanding_Fee__c} within 15 days of the date of this notification, or we will assign your account to a private collection agency. Payment Send a check or money order, payable to Department of Licensing (include your case number) to: {!MUSW__License2__c.Application_Type__c} Department of Licensing PO Box 35001 Seattle, WA 98124-3401 Proof of payment Send your proof of payment (include your case number) to the address shown below. Need help? {!MUSW__License2__c.Application_Type__c} Department of Licensing PO Box [PO Box] Olympia, WA 98507-[PO Box] Website: www.dol.wa.gov Email: [Program compliance email] Phone: [Program compliance phone] Authority: RCW 19.16.500
